This statistic shows the regional distribution of Catholics in 2010. In 2010, 47.5 percent of Catholics lived in the Americas.

This statistic shows the deviation of the annual mean daily temperatures from the long term mean in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2001 to 2019. In 2019, the mean daily temperature stood at 0.5 degrees Celsius.

This statistic displays the birth rate in Belgium from 2010 to 2019, with projections up until 2022. The birth rate is the average number of children borne by one woman while being of child-bearing age. In 2019, the birth rate in Belgium amounted to 1.65 children per woman.
This graph shows the number of documented migrants from Poland to the United States between 1820 and 1957. In 1957, there were 571 documented migrants from Poland to the United States.
This statistic shows the penetration rate of laptops in the United States from 2016 to 2018. In 2018, the penetration rate of laptops in the U.S. amounted to 55.61 percent.
This statistic shows the population change in Sudan from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, Sudan's population increased by approximately 2.39 percent compared to the previous year.

This statistic shows the value of alcoholic beverage exports from Sweden from 2009 to 2019. The value of alcoholic beverage exports from Sweden amounted to approximately 65.7 million Swedish kronor in 2019.

This statistic shows the share of consumers willing to pay more for environmentally friendly products in Mexico in 2019, by type. During the survey, 53 percent of respondents stated that they were willing to pay more for recycled material packaging.

As of March 2020, 40 percent of Brazilians had a monthly income up to twice the minimum wage, while 45 percent had a monthly income of 5 to 10 times the minimum wage. In contrast, 45 percent of Brazilians had a monthly income of 5 to 10 times the minimum wage. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.

In the view of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, Russia's e-sales market grew by 255 percent in March 2020 compared to the previous year. The e-sales market ozon.ru grew by 400 percent compared to the previous year. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.

The statistic shows the number of Facebook fans/Twitter followers of the NFL franchise Miami Dolphins from August 2012 to August 2020. In August 2020, the Facebook page of the Miami Dolphins football team had around 2.23 million fans.

This statistic shows the quarterly market value of equity crowdfunding on the alternative finance sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014 and 2015. In the fourth quarter of 2015, equity crowdfunding had a market value of 96.33 million British pounds ( GBP ).
This statistic shows the population change in Bhutan from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, Bhutan's population increased by approximately 1.15 percent compared to the previous year.

This statistic shows the value of French car manufacturers exports from France from 2012 to 2016. In 2016, the value of French car manufacturers exports from France amounted to approximately 46.2 billion euros.

The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Iraq from 2004 to 2019, with projections up until 2021. Gross domestic product ( GDP ) denotes the aggregate value of all services and goods produced within a country in any given year. GDP is an important indicator of a country's economic power. In 2019, Iraq's gross domestic product amounted to around 708.27 billion international dollars.

This statistic shows the share of votes in general elections in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 1918 to 2019, by political party. In 2019, the Conservative Party's share of votes amounted to 43.6 percent.
This statistic shows the distribution of educational attainment among U.S. veterans in 2017, by gender. In 2017, about 35.3 percent of U.S. veterans had a high school degree.

This statistic presents the share of online consumers in the United States who use digital wallets as of May 2017, sorted by age group. During the survey period, it was found that 30 percent of respondents aged 18 to 29 years used digital wallets.

The timeline shows the per capita consumption of peas, nuts and similar products in Norway in selected years from 1979 to 2019. According to the report, the per capita consumption of peas, nuts and similar products in Norway amounted to approximately 7.9 kilograms in 2019.
This statistic shows the development of Virginia's real GDP from 2000 to 2019. In 2019, the real GDP of Virginia was 486 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the development of Canada's real GDP in 2019, by province. In 2019, the real GDP of Ontario was 744.44 billion chained 2012 Canadian dollars.

This statistic presents the average annual revenue per employee of professional services within software as a service ( SaaS ) companies worldwide from 2015 to 2019. In 2019, the average revenue per employee of professional services within software as a service ( SaaS ) companies amounted to 199 thousand U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the share of football players with a migration background on FIFA World Cups from 1930 to 2018. In 2018, 13.2 percent of football players had a migration background on FIFA World Cups.

The statistic shows the PC operating system distribution for software development worldwide in 2018 and 2020. In 2020, 64 percent of the global PC operating system distribution for software development was generated through Windows.

This statistic shows the share of Americans who personally own a gun, by their political affiliation in 2011. 41 percent of Republican and lean Republican respondents stated that they personally own a gun.

This statistic shows the fertility rate in Puerto Rico from 2008 to 2018. The fertility rate is the average number of children born by one woman while being of child-bearing age. In 2018, the fertility rate in Puerto Rico amounted to 1.04 children per woman.
As of June 2020, Jennie Blackpink had the most followers on Instagram in South Korea, with 27.55 million followers. BTS official ranked second, with 25.89 million followers.

According to a survey carried out in the Philippines in 2020, 51 percent of Filipinos believed that the coronavirus COVID-19 outbreak would have a negative impact on their leisure travel plans. Moreover, 47 percent of Filipinos believed that business travel plans would have a negative impact on their travel plans. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.

This statistic shows the annual change in the producer price index of steel aggregates in the United States from January to July 2012. In July 2012, the producer price index of steel aggregates decreased by two percent.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among online shoppers in the United Kingdom ( UK ) on the importance of the following criteria when choosing an online shop. During the survey period, it was found that 71 percent of respondents believed that product quality was very important when choosing an online shop.
This statistic shows the number of state-led interventions in the internet freedom in Russia in 2019, by type. In 2019, there were 227,785 state-led interventions in the internet freedom in Russia.

This statistic shows the average cost per click on Yahoo! Bing Network in selected industries in the United States in the first quarter of 2013 and 2014. In the first quarter of 2014, the average cost per click on Yahoo! Bing Network was 0.55 U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the retail mobile commerce sales in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014 and 2019, by device type. In 2019, retail mobile commerce sales amounted to approximately 2.9 billion British pounds.

The statistic depicts the revenue of the San Antonio Spurs franchise from the 2001/02 season to the 2018/19 season. In 2018/19, the estimated revenue of the National Basketball Association franchise amounted to 285 million U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the number of Facebook fans/Twitter followers of the NFL franchise Houston Texans from August 2012 to August 2020. In August 2020, the Facebook page of the Houston Texans football team had around 2.16 million fans.

This statistic shows the opinion of U.S. adults on whether people who participate in neighborhood watch programs should or should not carry guns. 22 percent of respondents stated that they think people who participate in neighborhood watch programs should or should not carry guns.

This statistic shows the value of the rheumatoid arthritis treatment market in the U.S. in 2013 and 2020. In 2013, the U.S. rheumatoid arthritis treatment market was valued at 6.4 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows SABMiller's EBITA margin worldwide in 2016, by region. In that year, SABMiller's EBITA margin in North America amounted to 18.5 percent.

This statistic shows the number of politically motivated crimes with a right-wing or left-wing extremist background in Germany in 2019, by type. In 2019, there were a total of 21,290 politically motivated crimes with a right-wing or left-wing extremist background in Germany.
This statistic shows the economic losses due to dry disasters - landslides and avalanches - from 1900 to 2016. In 2016, the landslide in Peru amounted to approximately 2,000 thousand U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the youth unemployment rate in Belgium from 1999 and 2020. According to the source, the data are ILO estimates. In 2020, the estimated youth unemployment rate in Belgium was at 16.31 percent.

According to a survey conducted in the United States in March 2020, the most common rule to contain the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) was to wash hands thoroughly, with an average of 9.95 percent agreeing to one. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.

This statistic shows the state and local general sales and selected sales tax revenue in the United States from 1977 to 2017. In 2017, state and local general sales and selected sales tax revenue in the United States amounted to approximately 574.25 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the share of preferred moments for drinking coffee in Italy in 2016. During the survey, 77 percent of respondents stated that breakfast was the most preferred moment for drinking coffee.

This statistic shows the national debt of Côte d'Ivoire from 2014 to 2018, with projections up until 2024. In 2018, the national debt of Côte d'Ivoire amounted to approximately 21.47 billion U.S. dollars.

As of March 11, 2020, 44 percent of U.S. adults aged 18 to 29 years believed that the threat of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) has been exaggerated. This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. adults believing the threat of coronavirus has been exaggerated as of March 11, 2020, by age. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.

Life expectancy in the United States, from birth, was 39.41 in the United States in 1860, and is expected to grow to 78.81 by the year 2020. Life expectancy in the U.S. is an important indicator of a country's economic power.

This statistic shows the number of registered automobiles in Illinois in 2016, broken down by type. In that year, Illinois had approximately 448,446 private and commercial automobiles ( including taxicabs ) registered.

As of December 22, 2020, the total number of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) cases in the Republic of Moldova amounted to 136,931. The number of confirmed cases in the Republic of Moldova amounted to approximately 121,1402. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.
